name: WooCommerce Multi Currency Report
author: anzia

sections.description:
Ni WooCommerce Multi Currency Report show the sales information base on different currency use in WooCommerce store. Report show the separate order total of each currency.

Dashboard Analysis

Dashboard show the last order information, completed order count, registered and guest customer count.

Order Report Information

Order report provide the order information like customer name, order details, currency details, payment method and customer billing information.

Currency report Information

Currency report provide the summary report base on the product sold currency, report show the information order total, order tax shipping tax base on different currency.

Group by the currency report base on currency, payment method and country.

Filter and Search

Report provide the option to filter the report base on currency and order period like today order, yesterday order and many more filter.

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate “Ni WooCommerce Multi Currency Report” plugin from admin panel.
  3. Find “Currency Report” menu in admin.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email :support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
